channel.title: Needing some help with Prayer books PI source
channel.description:
hey, i dled tragedy pking source and im editting it atm, i want to add the speech for the prayer books like last rites etc, and i think im on the right track here but how would i make the player say this above his head
"Thy cause was false, thy skills did lack; see you in Lumbridge when you get back."
my code is this atm[code=java] case 3840: c.sendMessage("Thy cause was false, thy skills did lack; see you in Lumbridge when you get back."); break;[/code] this is for the sara book, and if anyone could give me the code for adding the anim i would apreciate it very much. also where would i add the option part to? clicking most or action handler?
OK i got the forcedChat working, but how would i make an option pane appear when its clicked then link it to say different things like wedding ceremony, last rights etc??
any help atall is greatly apreciated

item.title: Needing some help with Prayer books PI source
item.dc:creator: @neil1111 neil1111
item.description:
@neil1111 wrote:

hey, i dled tragedy pking source and im editting it atm, i want to add the speech for the prayer books like last rites etc, and i think im on the right track here but how would i make the player say this above his head

“Thy cause was false, thy skills did lack; see you in Lumbridge when you get back.”

my code is this atm case 3840: c.sendMessage("Thy cause was false, thy skills did lack; see you in Lumbridge when you get back."); break;
this is for the sara book, and if anyone could give me the code for adding the anim i would apreciate it very much.
also where would i add the option part to? clicking most or action handler?

OK i got the forcedChat working, but how would i make an option pane appear when its clicked then link it to say different things like wedding ceremony, last rights etc??

any help atall is greatly apreciated
